brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts a tabular listing of services and the protocols or rules associated with them.

Service: World Wide Web (WWW)
Protocol: HTTP (Hypertext Transfer Protocol)

Service: E-mail
Protocols: SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol), POP (Post Office Protocol)

Service: Instant Messaging (Jabber, AIM)
Protocols: XMPP (Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol), OSCAR (Open System for Communication in Realtime)

Service: IP Telephony
Protocol: SIP (Session Initiation Protocol)
